channel.title: Compile.bat PLEASE HELP ME?
channel.description:
i have downloaded jdk 6.0 if i open my compile.bat i get : you don't have jdk 5.0 or 6.0
But i have !!!!
What must i do PLZ HELP ME !!!!!

item.title: Compile.bat PLEASE HELP ME?
item.dc:creator: @Killed_By_Squirrel Killed By Squirrel
item.description:
@Killed_By_Squirrel wrote:

Use Mod T’s ‘perfect’ compiler in runserver.bat , and copy and paste this into your compile.bat file @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" *.java pause Make sure you have JDK 6u1 installed.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile.bat PLEASE HELP ME?
item.dc:creator: @r4p3dscape r4p3dscape
item.description:
@r4p3dscape wrote:

Its alright, are u using mod tharoks comipler 1.9 thing?
If not get the code,
OK GET THE CODE.
THEN
RIGHT CLICK RUNSERVER.BAT AND CLICK EDIT, YOU WILL SEE A CODE, PASTE MOD THAROKS COMPILER CODE ONTOP OF THE CODE U SAW WHEN U PRESSED EDIT, (DONT DELETE THE CODE U FIRST SAW ON RUNSERVER IN NOTEDPAD)

OPTIONAL: MAKE A SPACE BETWEEN THE CODE AND THE RUNSERVER.BAT ( I DID THAT)

Ok, save as runserver.bat
you do want to replace it!
Click on runserver, it will open up, if you see
To compiler your server press c
To run your server press run
And itll show other stuff like that.

Or whatever, that means its work kk?
Hope that helped!

Read full topic
